input.sentences: we decided to go all out for the kids birthday .
in the afternoon the kids played games outside .
then the cake was brought out .
it was so cool | no one wanted to eat it .
we decided to get a good family picture with it before cutting in .
output.sentences: At a family gathering, multiple generations joined together including a young child and his grandfather, meeting for the first time.
One of his brothers looked on as he played with his toys, wondering if he had ever been held like that.
The family gathered around a table for cake, celebrating Chloe's birthday
In a bold attempt, a young member of the family swooped in to take a bite out of the cake if he could.
The family gathered for a picture together around the cake before it would be distributed.
